programme.title: The Long Island train shootings and gun control
programme.short_synopsis: Does a multiple murder on a Long Island train prove that America has a problem with guns?
programme.medium_synopsis: A random multiple murder on a Long Island train, America's problem with guns, the future for gun control and the failure of the 'Brady Bill'.
